name: Spider Fur Slippers
data: It decreases the users strength a bit.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than avarage.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'focus power'.
